turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there! Need a coffee fix--black and white mocha from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello! I can help with that. Would you mind telling me which location you're planning to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in Durham. I'd like to order from the one on Durham-Chapel Hill Blvd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, that's simple enough. You said you wanted a black and white mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please. I really need that coffee fix, haha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One large black and white mocha. What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me what all they offer again? I always forget.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can get almond milk, coconut milk, nonfat milk, whole milk, 2% milk, or soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want to go with whole milk this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done. Do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that you want added--espresso shot, extra flavoring, etc.?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wouldn't object to an extra shot or two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One or two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two please. No extra flavorings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So we've got a venti black and white mocha, whole milk, whipped cream, and two extra shots. Does that sound alright?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed with the Starbucks on Durham-Chapel Hill Blvd. It will be ready for pickup shortly, and you should receive your receipt as a text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much! You're a lifesaver
